chunks.text:
# Nutrition - Risk Screen| Resident: | Effective Date: | Location: |
|-----------|-----------------|-----------|
| Date of Birth: | Physician: | Allergies: |
| Diagnoses: | | |## A. High Nutrition/Hydration Risk Indicators
Check all that Apply

1. Significant weight change 5% - 1 mo., 7.5% - 3 mo., 10% - 6 mo., or <79%/>130% of Goal/UBW

2. Severely underweight or BMI below 18.5

3. Severely overweight or BMI above 30
chunks.section_title: Severely underweight or BMI below 18.5

chunks.text:
4. Recent changed appetite/food intake less than 50% at most meals

5. Chronic/poor fluid intake (<50% recommended daily fluid intake or signs/symptoms of dehydration, hypodermoclysis)
chunks.section_title: Recent changed appetite/food intake less than 50% at most meals

chunks.text:
6. Advancing chronic disease significantly affecting intake

7. Advancing dementia and/or behaviour significantly affecting intake
chunks.section_title: Advancing chronic disease significantly affecting intake

chunks.text:
8. Uncontrolled diabetes

9. Renal disease with nutrient restrictions or liver disease with nutrient restrictions
chunks.section_title: Uncontrolled diabetes

chunks.text:
10. Enteral feeding/TPN/hypodermoclysis

11. Dysphagia, newly diagnosed or unstable
chunks.section_title: Enteral feeding/TPN/hypodermoclysis

chunks.text:
12. GI concerns e.g. diarrhea, nausea, emesis >3 days (excluding outbreak)

13. Total dependence at meals / requires extensive assistance to eat/drink
chunks.section_title: GI concerns e.g. diarrhea, nausea, emesis >3 days (excluding outbreak)

chunks.text:
14. Recurrent UTI

15. Skin and Wound Management: pressure injuries stage 2+, unstageable wounds, delayed wound healing
chunks.section_title: Recurrent UTI

chunks.text:
16. Abnormal lab values indicative of high nutritional risk

17. Medications negatively affecting appetite and/or nutrient absorption and/or hydration status
chunks.section_title: Abnormal lab values indicative of high nutritional risk

chunks.text:
18. Chronic pain affecting appetite

19. Palliative care
chunks.section_title: Chronic pain affecting appetite

chunks.text:
20. Other concerns:## B. Moderate Nutrition/Hydration Risk Indicators

1. BMI between 18.5-23 or 80-89% or 111-129% of Goal/UBW
chunks.section_title: Other concerns:## B. Moderate Nutrition/Hydration Risk Indicators

chunks.text:
2. Underweight or overweight but stable for 3 months or more

3. Food intake 51-75% at most meals/snacks
chunks.section_title: Underweight or overweight but stable for 3 months or more

chunks.text:
4. Poor or changed fluid intake (<75% but >51% target daily fluid requirement)

5. Food allergies, food intolerances, food restrictions
chunks.section_title: Poor or changed fluid intake (<75% but >51% target daily fluid requirement)

chunks.text:
6. Dysphagia - stable, no documented incidents of coughing/choking in last quarter, no pneumonias

7. Poor skin integrity/recurring skin tears or wounds
chunks.section_title: Dysphagia - stable, no documented incidents of coughing/choking in last quarter, no pneumonias

chunks.text:
8. Medical concerns that are stable (e.g. diverticular disease, Crohn's, celiac disease, IBS, colitis, c.diff, diabetes, hypertension, edema, CHF, COPD, renal or liver disease)

9. Newly occurring constipation and/or frequent diarrhea and/or changed bowel habits
chunks.section_title: Medical concerns that are stable (e.g. diverticular disease, Crohn's, celiac disease, IBS, colitis, c.diff, diabetes, hypertension, edema, CHF, COPD, renal or liver disease)

chunks.text:
10. Requires limited assistance / supervision to eat/drink

11. Other concerns:## C. Low Nutrition/Hydration Risk Indicators----**Page 1 of 2**# Nutrition - Risk Screen**Resident:**
**Date of Birth:**## Risk Assessment Criteria1. No significant weight change/weight stable or BMI 24-29 or >90-110% Goal/UBW
chunks.section_title: Requires limited assistance / supervision to eat/drink

chunks.text:
2. Consumes >75% from a variety of foods at most meals

3. Consumes >75% target daily fluid requirement
chunks.section_title: Consumes >75% from a variety of foods at most meals

chunks.text:
4. Skin intact

5. Regular bowel function
chunks.section_title: Skin intact

chunks.text:
6. Independent at meals/snacks

7. Other concerns:## D. Nutrition/Hydration Risk### Final Risk Determination1. High Risk
chunks.section_title: Independent at meals/snacks

chunks.text:
2. Moderate Risk

3. Low Risk
chunks.section_title: Moderate Risk

chunks.text:
4. Rationale for determination:----**Signature:**
**Date:**----**Page 2 of 2**
chunks.section_title: Rationale for determination:----**Signature:**
